lead_paragraph: Russian doping whistleblower Yulia Stepanova could race at next week's European championships as the first exemption from Russia's doping ban if an imminent IAAF ruling goes her way.

headline.print_headline: Whistleblower Stepanova Awaits Ruling to Race Again at Euros
headline.main: Whistleblower Stepanova Awaits Ruling to Race Again at Euros

snippet: Russian doping whistleblower Yulia Stepanova could race at next week's European championships as the first exemption from Russia's doping ban if an imminent IAAF ruling goes her way....
